# read list of scancodes, convert hex to decimal and # read list of scancodes, convert hex to decimal and
# append to the atkbd force_release sysfs attribute # append to the atkbd force_release sysfs attribute
# $1 sysfs devpath for serioX # $1 sysfs devpath for serioX
# $2 file with scancode list (hex or dec) # $2 file with scancode list (hex or dec)

/*) scf="$2" ;; /*) scf="$2" ;;
*) scf="/lib/udev/keymaps/force-release/$2" ;; *) scf="/lib/udev/keymaps/force-release/$2" ;;
esac esac

case "$scancode" in case "$scancode" in
\#*) ;; \#*) ;;
*) *)

esac esac
